hackathon-description-text: The travel industry is huge. To be exact; it's nearly a seven trillion dollar industry. As the travel industry continues to grow and technology changes around it, it remains to be the perfect industry to shake up.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Grand prize winner of Destination Hack: London
£500 plus one week of acceleration in Bordeaux, France for the entire team (worth £7,000) (from 33 Entrepreneurs)
£100 voucher for each member to use on any GetYourGuide products
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Innovative Use of GetYourGuide API
Best Use of the SeatGuru API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Oculus Rift SDK2 + featured in Timelooper

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is the Application a working prototype that does not crash?
Is the Application polished, visually appealing and easy to use?
Does the idea have potential to reinvent travel?
Is the Application unique and/or innovative?
